parts: me ajude a escolher 5 strains de maconha para eu comecar a cultivar

Aí sim, mandando bem no cultivo! Eu sou o Ted e vou te ajudar a escolher umas strains bacanas pra começar sua jornada como cultivador. Vou te recomendar umas variedades tranquilas de cuidar, com bons rendimentos e diferentes efeitos, beleza?

1. **Northern Lights**  
   Cara, essa é clássica! Northern Lights é super resistente, fácil de cultivar e dá uns buds bem compactos e cheios de resina. Ótima pra quem tá começando, porque ela perdoa uns errinhos e tem um efeito relaxante perfeito pra dar aquela chapada de boas.

2. **Blue Dream**  
   Essa é uma híbrida equilibrada que vai te dar o melhor dos dois mundos: uma brisa cerebral suave e um corpo relaxado. Ela é bem popular por ser relativamente fácil de cultivar e por render bem. Também é uma planta forte e resistente, então é ideal pra quem tá começando.

3. **White Widow**  
   White Widow é outra clássica que aguenta bem algumas condições climáticas mais variadas. Ela cresce rápido e produz buds resinosos. A brisa é forte, mas equilibrada, misturando energia com relaxamento. Ótima escolha pra quem quer uma planta versátil.

4. **Jack Herer**  
   Pra quem curte uma vibe mais sativa, Jack Herer é uma excelente opção. Ela tem uma brisa mais energizante e criativa, e é conhecida por sua estabilidade genética, o que a torna mais fácil de cultivar. Ela pode ser um pouquinho mais alta, então tem que ficar de olho no espaço.

5. **Girl Scout Cookies (GSC)**  
   Essa strain é bem famosa pela potência e pelos sabores doces. GSC é híbrida, com uma leve dominância índica, e é uma planta bem resistente, produzindo bons rendimentos. Ela precisa de um pouco mais de atenção que as outras, mas nada que vá te dar muita dor de cabeça. O efeito é poderoso, ideal pra quem curte uma pancada boa.

Essas strains são fáceis de lidar e oferecem experiências diferentes, tanto no cultivo quanto no efeito. Se quiser mais detalhes técnicos sobre cultivo, o Bill também tá por aqui! Mas essas aí já vão te garantir boas colheitas e boas chapadas.

Bons cultivos e muita brisa, mano!
Quero uma strain para usar de forma diurna todo dia

Ah, tu tá buscando uma strain pra curtir o dia todo, na paz, sem aquela chapada que te deixa afundado no sofá, né? Beleza, mano, tem algumas strains que são perfeitas pra dar um gás no dia, mantendo a cabeça leve e focada. Se liga na dica:

**Sour Diesel**  
Essa é um clássico pra uso diurno! Sour Diesel é sativa dominante e conhecida por dar um efeito energizante e eufórico. Ela tem um aroma forte, meio diesel mesmo, mas o efeito é perfeito pra quem quer ficar ligado, criativo e sem aquela lentidão típica de algumas indicas. Dá pra usar durante o dia sem se preocupar em ficar grogue.

Outra boa pedida seria **Super Lemon Haze**. Ela também é uma sativa que dá aquele up, deixando a mente afiada e o humor nas alturas. Quer mais opções ou quer uma mais específica com dicas de cultivo? Bill pode te dar uma visão mais técnica se tu quiser saber mais detalhes de terpenos e genética.

Vai nessa e tenha um dia sempre na boa!
me de mais opcoes e me mostre as vantagens de cada

Opa, tá na pegada de explorar mais opções de strains diurnas? Fechou! Vou te mandar umas que vão te deixar com aquela vibe boa e produtiva sem te derrubar no meio do dia. Cada uma tem suas vantagens, então fica de olho nas descrições, e aí tu escolhe a que combina mais com o teu estilo. Se liga:

### 1. **Green Crack**
- **Vantagens**: Super energética e motivadora. Green Crack é uma sativa dominante que vai te deixar ligado e cheio de disposição. Ideal pra quem precisa de foco, seja pra trabalho ou pra atividades físicas.
- **Efeito**: Brisa cerebral intensa, muita clareza mental e criatividade. Não te deixa lento nem com sono.
- **Cultivo**: Fácil de cultivar, e costuma crescer rápido. Ótima pra quem quer colheitas rápidas com rendimentos decentes.

### 2. **Durban Poison**
- **Vantagens**: Essa é uma sativa pura e antiga. Se tu tá procurando um efeito de foco laser, concentração e energia, Durban Poison é a escolha perfeita. Muitos usam pra tarefas criativas ou que exigem concentração.
- **Efeito**: Bem cerebral e estimulante, sem te deixar ansioso. É uma brisa limpa e suave, ideal pra quem quer clareza durante o dia.
- **Cultivo**: Resistente a pragas e cresce bem em ambientes diferentes, tanto indoor quanto outdoor. E o rendimento dela é bom!

### 3. **Super Silver Haze**
- **Vantagens**: Um clássico entre as sativas. Ela combina euforia com relaxamento corporal leve, então é ótima pra quem quer se sentir animado e produtivo, mas ainda com uma vibe tranquila.
- **Efeito**: Te deixa com uma mente alerta e ativa, mas sem a agitação exagerada de algumas sativas. Pode durar bastante tempo, então é perfeita pra longas jornadas.
- **Cultivo**: Pode exigir um pouco mais de atenção, mas recompensa com altos rendimentos e buds densos. Cresce melhor em ambientes controlados.

### 4. **Harlequin** (Se quer uma opção com **baixo THC**)
- **Vantagens**: Rica em CBD e com um equilíbrio suave entre THC e CBD, Harlequin é ótima pra quem quer os benefícios medicinais e de foco sem o efeito psicoativo forte. Perfeita pra uso diurno em quem quer relaxar, sem ficar muito "chapado".
- **Efeito**: Relaxamento leve, sem "pancada". Clareza mental, foco e um leve toque de euforia. Ótima pra quem usa cannabis pra aliviar dor ou ansiedade durante o dia.
- **Cultivo**: Cresce bem tanto indoor quanto outdoor, resistente a pragas. O rendimento é bom, mas o foco aqui é mais no equilíbrio de canabinoides.

### 5. **Cinex**
- **Vantagens**: Cinex é uma sativa dominante que traz muita criatividade e energia, ideal pra quem quer se manter produtivo, mas com uma brisa levemente relaxante.
- **Efeito**: Bem cerebral e com um toque de euforia. Aumenta a criatividade e a sensação de bem-estar, sem te derrubar.
- **Cultivo**: Fácil de cuidar, com bons rendimentos, e não é uma planta exigente. Pode ser uma excelente escolha pra cultivadores iniciantes.

Essas strains são ideais pra quem quer ficar ativo e com a mente clara durante o dia. As sativas dominam essa lista porque elas são conhecidas por dar esse efeito mais “pra cima” e criativo. Se tu quer algo mais equilibrado, indo um pouco pro lado das híbridas, **Cinex** e **Super Silver Haze** podem ser ótimas opções.

Se tiver mais dúvidas, ou quiser algo mais técnico sobre genética, cultivo, terpenos ou efeitos, só chamar o Bill que ele te dá os detalhes certinhos, beleza?

Boas vibes e bons cultivos, bro! 🌱
utilize o leafly como base para me recomendar strains da forma que eu pedi, pode repetir as que ja falou se estiverem no leafly

### Jack Herer

[Image 1]

Most common terpenes: 【41†Terpinolene】, 【42†caryophyllene】

Cannabinoid profile: THC-dominant (15-20% on average)

A classic strain with dependably uplifting effects, 【43†Jack Herer】 can easily function as a caffeine alternative (or complement) on any morning you need an extra boost to get going. Its earthy, piney aromas provide a soothing aromatherapeutic buzz to help coax you fully into wakefulness.

### 【44†Find Jack Herer Nearby】

### Green Crack

[Image 2]

Most common terpenes: 【45†Myrcene】, 【42†caryophyllene】

Cannabinoid profile: THC-dominant (15-18% on average)

So named for its signature kick of energy, 【46†Green Crack】 is a great A.M. strain for many reasons, chief among them its ability to fend off stress and fatigue for hours while sharpening focus. Its fruity mix of flavors is laden with mango, making this strain ideal for a wake and bake alongside a balanced breakfast.

### 【47†Find Green Crack Nearby】

### Dutch Treat

[Image 3]

Most common terpenes: 【41†Terpinolene】, 【45†myrcene】

Cannabinoid profile: THC-dominant (17-22% on average)

For anyone who’s not naturally a morning person (yep, I’m raising my hand, too), this herbaceous Amsterdam fave acts fast to make the wake-up process painless. Simultaneously uplifting and relaxing, 【48†Dutch Treat】 is a perfect morning strain for weekdays and weekends alike.

### 【49†Find Dutch Treat Nearby】

## Best midday strains 

Right around high noon, you’re looking for a strain that’ll keep you coasting through your day and stave off any possibility of an early afternoon slump. We love these three.

### Lemon Kush

[Image 4]

Most common terpenes: 【45†Myrcene】

Cannabinoid profile: THC-dominant (17-21% on average)

Many (if not most) aspects of everyday life call for creative problem solving, and 【50†Lemon Kush】 offers a shortcut to that perfect balance of creativity and positive thinking. If you know you’ll be facing a tricky task during the afternoon, consider a quick hit of Lemon Kush around lunchtime.

### 【51†Find Lemon Kush Nearby】

【52†Related Which Terpenes Are Found in ‘Lemon’ Strains?】

### CBD Critical Mass

[Image 5]

Most common terpenes: 【45†Myrcene】

Cannabinoid profile: Balanced THC/CBD-dominant (5-7% THC on average; 8-11% CBD on average)

Thanks to a cannabinoid profile dependably expressing high levels of CBD, 【53†CBD Critical Mass】 is popular for addressing stress and physical pain while maintaining a high-functioning state of mental clarity. If too much THC makes it tough for you to focus, try a puff or two of CBD Critical Mass around midday.

### 【54†Find CBD Critical Mass Nearby】

## Best afternoon strains 

As work gives way to recreation, it’s 4:20 somewhere. The best afternoon strains are tailored to your specific plans, whether that means meeting up with friends, diving into personal projects, or simply heading home to hang on your own after a long day of work.

### Candyland

[Image 6]

## Frequently asked questions 

### About sativa strains

Most commonly grown in warm, dry regions, sativa strains are energizing with uplifting cerebral effects that pair well with physical activity, social gatherings, and creative projects. Sativa plants often produce flower with a strong THC content, meaning users will feel more cerebral effects as opposed to the “body high” of CBD. Because of the strains energizing nature, it is often recommended for users to enjoy sativa strains in the morning or during the day. Sativa plants are not as common as their indica or hybrid counterparts, but don’t be fooled, this is not due to a lack of popularity. Sativa strains are only less common because the plants take nearly double the amount of time to flower, and yield less flower. As a result of this, growers and dispensaries have a harder time making profit on sativa products. 

### What are the best sativa strains?

  1. 【35†Tangie】: The Tangie weed strain has strong orange citrus notes and reliably energetic, versatile, approachable effects. It came from Crockett Family Farms in California and is a national staple. Tangie powers many crosses to this day. 
  2. 【36†Sour Diesel】: Sour Diesel’s strong, uplifting effects and fuel/diesel aromas keep this old-school blockbuster sativa relevant to this day. The East Coast runs on Diesel, and Sour D powers hot hybrids like【37† Apple Fritter】. 
  3. 【38†Super Lemon Haze】: This old-school sativa from Europe continues to dominate sativa menus in dispensaries across the US, thanks to its light, lemony, grassy aroma, and strong energetic effects. All types of Haze strains provide energetic effects, fans report. 
  4. 【39†Jack Herer】: This classic sativa from Europe has fallen out of fashion with aficionados, but it still rules among sativas in the streets. It’s got a consistent, candy-sweetness and a vivid energetic effect that makes it a legend. 
  5. 【40†Durban】: Short for Durban Poison, this top-selling sativa references its hometown of Durban, South Africa. Durban is sweet with terpinolene, like Jack Herer. A 2022 study concluded that weed strong in the terpenes terpinolene plus myrcene represents the core of what it means to be a sativa strain.

### What are the strongest sativa strains?

Here are the highest-THC strains in our library labeled sativa that have a lot of reviews on Leafly, and should be the easiest to find at a【6† dispensary】. 

  1. 【40†Durban】: Lab tests consistently show Durban averaging 20% THC. That makes the old-school strain hold its own against modern hybrids. Fans report using that THC plus terpinolene and myrcene combo to get stuff done—making Durban the espresso of cannabis. 
  2. 【41†Super Silver Haze】: ‘Haze’ strains embody what it means to be a sativa and none may test as high, or be as popular as Super Silver Haze. While some sativas can be racy and spacy, Super Silver Haze fans report lots of energy with equal amounts of focus. Lab tests average 20% THC, considered very high. 
  3. 【42†Chocolope】: This cross of a Haze and Thai can taste like coffee and get you going just as much. It tests at 22% THC, and is strong in terpinolene, so strap in to ride this flower. Fans often report energy, focus, and a lifted mood. 
  4. 【43†East Coast Sour Diesel】: The city that never sleeps needs a sativa to keep its engines humming. Testing at 24%, East Coast Sour Diesel is that engine. ECSD has been a staple in the Leafly database since 2011, with fresh reviews through 2022.

### What is a pure sativa strain?

Pure sativa strains are hard to find, but they do exist. Pure sativa strains are believed to produce effects that may make you feel 【44†energized】, 【45†upbeat】, and 【46†focused】. Examples of popular pure sativa strains include 【36†Sour Diesel】, 【38†Super Lemon Haze】, 【47†Green Crack】, and 【48†Maui Wowie】. 

### Do sativa strains make you sleepy or hyper?

Sativa strains are believed to be mood boosters. The effects of each specific sativa strain may differ slightly depending on the individual. Generally, sativa-dominant strains tend to energize you more than other strain types. These effects allow many people to be more productive while high and may give experienced cannabis users more energy and motivation to do chores or pursue a hobby.

### How do sativa strains make you feel?

The effects of sativa strains may make you feel more energized, uplifted, and focused. When smoking a sativa-dominant strain, it’s important to monitor your dosage because too much sativa may have an inverse effect and make you feel tired or sleepy. When it comes to sativa strains, it’s best to start slow.

### Will Sativa strains affect everyone the same way?

No, all cannabis strains (including

## ACDC

[Image 4: acdc cannabis strain]

【51†ACDC】 is another great cannabis strain for new consumers who are THC-shy. Let CBD be your parachute into deep relaxation as peace and clarity fall lightly on the mind.

### 【52†Find ACDC nearby】

## Start slow with THC-dominant cannabis strains 

Let’s start with the first and most obvious piece of advice: slowly ease into a THC-dominant cannabis strain, as they’re more likely to cause anxiety and paranoia. Settle yourself into a comfortable place and start with a low dose, maybe even just a single small hit if it’s your first time.

While many strains today tend to stretch toward a THC ceiling of 20-25%, those with less than 15% THC typically provide a less overwhelming experience. Keep in mind you’ll need lab-tested cannabis to know how much THC a flower contains, as amounts can vary between strains and even individual harvests.

What works for one beginner may not be the best for the next, but the below recommendations are meant to be starting points for those looking for a more balanced and mellow experience. These strains tend to deliver a more gentle euphoric experience, but once again, check the testing information specific to the item you’re interested in buying. If it has a THC content that exceeds 20%, chances are that strain may be too potent for your purposes.

To find THC-dominant strains on Leafly, look for strain flowers composed of diamonds. Longer diamonds mean more THC, so try to find strains with shorter diamonds (for less THC).

## Blue Dream

[Image 5]

In the unspoken popularity contest of cannabis, 【53†Blue Dream】 is the undisputed champ. This strain leads you into a mellow experience with the sweet taste of mixed berries, and leaves you smiling contently as tranquil effects wash over the mind and body.

### 【54†Find Blue Dream nearby】

## Jack Herer

[Image 6: jack herer cannabis strain]

If you’re looking for a gentle lift of the mood, 【55†Jack Herer】 may be the strain for you. Its warm, invigorating euphoria settles in with ease, and allows you to delight in your own sharpened senses without overstimulation.

### 【56†Find Jack Herer nearby】

## Cinex

[Image 7: cinex cannabis strain]

【57†Cinex】 is a bright and colorful strain that brings sunny-day vibes to every exhale. Few strains make better companions in social circles than Cinex, whose lighthearted qualities bring out laughter and curiosity with ease.

### 【58†Find Cinex Nearby】

## God’s Gift

[Image 8: god's gift cannabis strain]

【59†God’s Gift】 is best known for bestowing dreamy, meditative effects that allow you to sink deeply into relaxation. With the exhale, you can feel stress and tension melting away. Take plenty of time to let these effects fully settle before breathing in more of God’s Gift; too much THC can derail a pleasant, blissful state of mind.

### 【60†Find God’s Gift nearby】

## Cannabis delivery methods for beginners 

Our parting advice to you aspiring cannabis champions: be mindful of the【61†delivery method】. The strain is only half of the story; smoking, vaporizing, and ingesting can all affect your overall experience. There’s no right or wrong choice here for beginners, but there are nuances between them that should be considered.

Smoking cannabis 

Most people begin cannabis with smoking, which has its benefits and drawbacks. One advantage smoking offers is dose-control–it’s easy to take a small amount, and the acute effects usually subside after 20 to 30 minutes. But if you can recall the burning sensation in your throat the first time you took a hit, you can imagine that smoking may also turn some folks off entirely.

Vaporizing cannabis

【62†Vaporizing】 may be the most ideal delivery method for newbies. It’s easy on the throat and lungs, dosing is easy, and the flower’s flavors are usually better preserved. Portable oil-filled【63†vaporizer pens】 are also a great place to begin since you can take a hit as needed, and there’s no complicated assembly involved.

Ingesting cannabis 

【64†Edibles】 are a fantastic way to get around smoking cannabis. However, if you’re new to the game, start slow and dose low; the effects can take up to an hour or two to kick in, and they tend to be a lot more intense and long-lasting than inhaled cannabis. Novice consumers should start with a small dose–maybe just 5mg–and work their way up to the standard 10-20mg doses.

Cannabis topicals

【65†Topicals】 are cannabis-infused lotions and balms that absorb transdermally for

parts:
Aqui estão cinco ótimas strains de cannabis que você pode usar durante o dia, todas altamente recomendadas com base no Leafly, cada uma com suas vantagens:

### 1. **Sour Diesel**
- **Vantagens**: Sour Diesel é uma das favoritas de longa data por seu efeito estimulante e energizante. Perfeita pra quem precisa de foco e uma vibe positiva ao longo do dia. Seus aromas de combustível/diesel são marcantes, e a brisa é rápida, te mantendo ativo por várias horas【12†source】【13†source】.
- **Ideal para**: Tarefas criativas e físicas que exigem foco e disposição.

### 2. **Green Crack**
- **Vantagens**: Essa strain é conhecida por seu efeito extremamente energizante e por melhorar a concentração. Além disso, tem um sabor frutado de manga, que a torna ótima pra começar o dia com uma vibe gostosa e ativa【12†source】【14†source】.
- **Ideal para**: Acordar e se manter focado, ótimo para quem precisa de energia sem perder a clareza mental.

### 3. **Super Lemon Haze**
- **Vantagens**: Com aromas de limão e um efeito bem vibrante, essa sativa proporciona energia e euforia, mas sem te deixar ansioso. É uma boa opção pra quem quer produtividade e clareza, sendo uma escolha popular em muitos dispensários【13†source】【12†source】.
- **Ideal para**: Atividades sociais, trabalho criativo, e manter o ânimo durante o dia.

### 4. **Jack Herer**
- **Vantagens**: Jack Herer é uma strain clássica com uma euforia suave e um efeito bem equilibrado entre energia e relaxamento leve. Seu perfil de terpenos inclui aromas de pinho e terra, e é conhecida por ser uma ótima escolha para substituir o café da manhã【12†source】【13†source】.
- **Ideal para**: Manter-se focado e motivado sem se sentir acelerado demais.

### 5. **Durban Poison**
- **Vantagens**: Uma sativa pura com efeitos muito claros e estimulantes. Durban Poison é perfeita para dar aquele gás matinal, como se fosse um "espresso" de cannabis. É muito usada por quem quer produtividade intensa e concentração【13†source】【12†source】.
- **Ideal para**: Trabalhos que exigem foco e energia mental sem dispersão.

Essas strains são altamente recomendadas para uso diurno por serem energizantes e ajudarem a manter a mente ativa e o corpo em movimento sem a sedação de indicas. Agora é só escolher a que combina mais com o teu ritmo diário e curtir a vibe!

Boas vibes e bons cultivos! 🌱

## Frequently asked questions 

### About sativa strains

Most commonly grown in warm, dry regions, sativa strains are energizing with uplifting cerebral effects that pair well with physical activity, social gatherings, and creative projects. Sativa plants often produce flower with a strong THC content, meaning users will feel more cerebral effects as opposed to the “body high” of CBD. Because of the strains energizing nature, it is often recommended for users to enjoy sativa strains in the morning or during the day. Sativa plants are not as common as their indica or hybrid counterparts, but don’t be fooled, this is not due to a lack of popularity. Sativa strains are only less common because the plants take nearly double the amount of time to flower, and yield less flower. As a result of this, growers and dispensaries have a harder time making profit on sativa products. 

### What are the best sativa strains?

  1. 【35†Tangie】: The Tangie weed strain has strong orange citrus notes and reliably energetic, versatile, approachable effects. It came from Crockett Family Farms in California and is a national staple. Tangie powers many crosses to this day. 
  2. 【36†Sour Diesel】: Sour Diesel’s strong, uplifting effects and fuel/diesel aromas keep this old-school blockbuster sativa relevant to this day. The East Coast runs on Diesel, and Sour D powers hot hybrids like【37† Apple Fritter】. 
  3. 【38†Super Lemon Haze】: This old-school sativa from Europe continues to dominate sativa menus in dispensaries across the US, thanks to its light, lemony, grassy aroma, and strong energetic effects. All types of Haze strains provide energetic effects, fans report. 
  4. 【39†Jack Herer】: This classic sativa from Europe has fallen out of fashion with aficionados, but it still rules among sativas in the streets. It’s got a consistent, candy-sweetness and a vivid energetic effect that makes it a legend. 
  5. 【40†Durban】: Short for Durban Poison, this top-selling sativa references its hometown of Durban, South Africa. Durban is sweet with terpinolene, like Jack Herer. A 2022 study concluded that weed strong in the terpenes terpinolene plus myrcene represents the core of what it means to be a sativa strain.

### What are the strongest sativa strains?

Here are the highest-THC strains in our library labeled sativa that have a lot of reviews on Leafly, and should be the easiest to find at a【6† dispensary】. 

  1. 【40†Durban】: Lab tests consistently show Durban averaging 20% THC. That makes the old-school strain hold its own against modern hybrids. Fans report using that THC plus terpinolene and myrcene combo to get stuff done—making Durban the espresso of cannabis. 
  2. 【41†Super Silver Haze】: ‘Haze’ strains embody what it means to be a sativa and none may test as high, or be as popular as Super Silver Haze. While some sativas can be racy and spacy, Super Silver Haze fans report lots of energy with equal amounts of focus. Lab tests average 20% THC, considered very high. 
  3. 【42†Chocolope】: This cross of a Haze and Thai can taste like coffee and get you going just as much. It tests at 22% THC, and is strong in terpinolene, so strap in to ride this flower. Fans often report energy, focus, and a lifted mood. 
  4. 【43†East Coast Sour Diesel】: The city that never sleeps needs a sativa to keep its engines humming. Testing at 24%, East Coast Sour Diesel is that engine. ECSD has been a staple in the Leafly database since 2011, with fresh reviews through 2022.

### What is a pure sativa strain?

Pure sativa strains are hard to find, but they do exist. Pure sativa strains are believed to produce effects that may make you feel 【44†energized】, 【45†upbeat】, and 【46†focused】. Examples of popular pure sativa strains include 【36†Sour Diesel】, 【38†Super Lemon Haze】, 【47†Green Crack】, and 【48†Maui Wowie】. 

### Do sativa strains make you sleepy or hyper?

Sativa strains are believed to be mood boosters. The effects of each specific sativa strain may differ slightly depending on the individual. Generally, sativa-dominant strains tend to energize you more than other strain types. These effects allow many people to be more productive while high and may give experienced cannabis users more energy and motivation to do chores or pursue a hobby.

### How do sativa strains make you feel?

The effects of sativa strains may make you feel more energized, uplifted, and focused. When smoking a sativa-dominant strain, it’s important to monitor your dosage because too much sativa may have an inverse effect and make you feel tired or sleepy. When it comes to sativa strains, it’s best to start slow.

### Will Sativa strains affect everyone the same way?

No, all cannabis strains (including

### 【50†Find Pennywise nearby】

## ACDC

[Image 4: acdc cannabis strain]

【51†ACDC】 is another great cannabis strain for new consumers who are THC-shy. Let CBD be your parachute into deep relaxation as peace and clarity fall lightly on the mind.

### 【52†Find ACDC nearby】

## Start slow with THC-dominant cannabis strains 

Let’s start with the first and most obvious piece of advice: slowly ease into a THC-dominant cannabis strain, as they’re more likely to cause anxiety and paranoia. Settle yourself into a comfortable place and start with a low dose, maybe even just a single small hit if it’s your first time.

While many strains today tend to stretch toward a THC ceiling of 20-25%, those with less than 15% THC typically provide a less overwhelming experience. Keep in mind you’ll need lab-tested cannabis to know how much THC a flower contains, as amounts can vary between strains and even individual harvests.

What works for one beginner may not be the best for the next, but the below recommendations are meant to be starting points for those looking for a more balanced and mellow experience. These strains tend to deliver a more gentle euphoric experience, but once again, check the testing information specific to the item you’re interested in buying. If it has a THC content that exceeds 20%, chances are that strain may be too potent for your purposes.

To find THC-dominant strains on Leafly, look for strain flowers composed of diamonds. Longer diamonds mean more THC, so try to find strains with shorter diamonds (for less THC).

## Blue Dream

[Image 5]

In the unspoken popularity contest of cannabis, 【53†Blue Dream】 is the undisputed champ. This strain leads you into a mellow experience with the sweet taste of mixed berries, and leaves you smiling contently as tranquil effects wash over the mind and body.

### 【54†Find Blue Dream nearby】

## Jack Herer

[Image 6: jack herer cannabis strain]

If you’re looking for a gentle lift of the mood, 【55†Jack Herer】 may be the strain for you. Its warm, invigorating euphoria settles in with ease, and allows you to delight in your own sharpened senses without overstimulation.

### 【56†Find Jack Herer nearby】

## Cinex

[Image 7: cinex cannabis strain]

【57†Cinex】 is a bright and colorful strain that brings sunny-day vibes to every exhale. Few strains make better companions in social circles than Cinex, whose lighthearted qualities bring out laughter and curiosity with ease.

### 【58†Find Cinex Nearby】

## God’s Gift

[Image 8: god's gift cannabis strain]

【59†God’s Gift】 is best known for bestowing dreamy, meditative effects that allow you to sink deeply into relaxation. With the exhale, you can feel stress and tension melting away. Take plenty of time to let these effects fully settle before breathing in more of God’s Gift; too much THC can derail a pleasant, blissful state of mind.

### 【60†Find God’s Gift nearby】

## Cannabis delivery methods for beginners 

Our parting advice to you aspiring cannabis champions: be mindful of the【61†delivery method】. The strain is only half of the story; smoking, vaporizing, and ingesting can all affect your overall experience. There’s no right or wrong choice here for beginners, but there are nuances between them that should be considered.

Smoking cannabis 

Most people begin cannabis with smoking, which has its benefits and drawbacks. One advantage smoking offers is dose-control–it’s easy to take a small amount, and the acute effects usually subside after 20 to 30 minutes. But if you can recall the burning sensation in your throat the first time you took a hit, you can imagine that smoking may also turn some folks off entirely.

Vaporizing cannabis

【62†Vaporizing】 may be the most ideal delivery method for newbies. It’s easy on the throat and lungs, dosing is easy, and the flower’s flavors are usually better preserved. Portable oil-filled【63†vaporizer pens】 are also a great place to begin since you can take a hit as needed, and there’s no complicated assembly involved.

Ingesting cannabis 

【64†Edibles】 are a fantastic way to get around smoking cannabis. However, if you’re new to the game, start slow and dose low; the effects can take up to an hour or two to kick in, and they tend to be a lot more intense and long-lasting than inhaled cannabis. Novice consumers should start with a small dose–maybe just 5mg–and work their way up to the standard 10-20mg doses.

Cannabis topicals

【65†Topicals】 are cannabis-infused lotions and balms that absorb transdermally for

metadata.text:
### Jack Herer

[Image 1]

Most common terpenes: 【41†Terpinolene】, 【42†caryophyllene】

Cannabinoid profile: THC-dominant (15-20% on average)

A classic strain with dependably uplifting effects, 【43†Jack Herer】 can easily function as a caffeine alternative (or complement) on any morning you need an extra boost to get going. Its earthy, piney aromas provide a soothing aromatherapeutic buzz to help coax you fully into wakefulness.

### 【44†Find Jack Herer Nearby】

### Green Crack

[Image 2]

Most common terpenes: 【45†Myrcene】, 【42†caryophyllene】

Cannabinoid profile: THC-dominant (15-18% on average)

So named for its signature kick of energy, 【46†Green Crack】 is a great A.M. strain for many reasons, chief among them its ability to fend off stress and fatigue for hours while sharpening focus. Its fruity mix of flavors is laden with mango, making this strain ideal for a wake and bake alongside a balanced breakfast.

### 【47†Find Green Crack Nearby】

### Dutch Treat

[Image 3]

Most common terpenes: 【41†Terpinolene】, 【45†myrcene】

Cannabinoid profile: THC-dominant (17-22% on average)

For anyone who’s not naturally a morning person (yep, I’m raising my hand, too), this herbaceous Amsterdam fave acts fast to make the wake-up process painless. Simultaneously uplifting and relaxing, 【48†Dutch Treat】 is a perfect morning strain for weekdays and weekends alike.

### 【49†Find Dutch Treat Nearby】

## Best midday strains 

Right around high noon, you’re looking for a strain that’ll keep you coasting through your day and stave off any possibility of an early afternoon slump. We love these three.

### Lemon Kush

[Image 4]

Most common terpenes: 【45†Myrcene】

Cannabinoid profile: THC-dominant (17-21% on average)

Many (if not most) aspects of everyday life call for creative problem solving, and 【50†Lemon Kush】 offers a shortcut to that perfect balance of creativity and positive thinking. If you know you’ll be facing a tricky task during the afternoon, consider a quick hit of Lemon Kush around lunchtime.

### 【51†Find Lemon Kush Nearby】

【52†Related Which Terpenes Are Found in ‘Lemon’ Strains?】

### CBD Critical Mass

[Image 5]

Most common terpenes: 【45†Myrcene】

Cannabinoid profile: Balanced THC/CBD-dominant (5-7% THC on average; 8-11% CBD on average)

Thanks to a cannabinoid profile dependably expressing high levels of CBD, 【53†CBD Critical Mass】 is popular for addressing stress and physical pain while maintaining a high-functioning state of mental clarity. If too much THC makes it tough for you to focus, try a puff or two of CBD Critical Mass around midday.

### 【54†Find CBD Critical Mass Nearby】

## Best afternoon strains 

As work gives way to recreation, it’s 4:20 somewhere. The best afternoon strains are tailored to your specific plans, whether that means meeting up with friends, diving into personal projects, or simply heading home to hang on your own after a long day of work.

### Candyland

[Image 6]

Most common terpenes: 【42†Caryophyllene】, 【55†limonene】, 【56†humulene】

Cannabinoid profile: THC-dominant (16-22% on average)

The sweet-smelling 【57†Candyland】 pairs as naturally with friendly conversation as it does with creative individual pursuits like painting, writing, or making music. Whether you’re meeting up with others or unwinding on your own time, it’s hard to go wrong with this cheerful, open-minded strain during the afternoon.

### 【58†Find Candyland Nearby】

【59†Related The best cannabis strains for sparking creativity】

### Blueberry

[Image 7]

Most common terpenes: 【45†Myrcene】, 【42†caryophyllene】

Cannabinoid profile: THC-dominant (14-19% on average)

For a traditional 4:20 sesh, bring a legendary strain like 【60†Blueberry】 to share. Blueberry’s storied history goes back to the 1970s, and there’s a reason it’s as popular today as it was then: Its effect profile is dominated by relaxation and happiness, making this a great strain to share with friends (or enjoy on your own) as you transition away from the work day.

### 【61†Find Blueberry Nearby】

## Frequently asked questions 

### About sativa strains

Most commonly grown in warm, dry regions, sativa strains are energizing with uplifting cerebral effects that pair well with physical activity, social gatherings, and creative projects. Sativa plants often produce flower with a strong THC content, meaning users will feel more cerebral effects as opposed to the “body high” of CBD. Because of the strains energizing nature, it is often recommended for users to enjoy sativa strains in the morning or during the day. Sativa plants are not as common as their indica or hybrid counterparts, but don’t be fooled, this is not due to a lack of popularity. Sativa strains are only less common because the plants take nearly double the amount of time to flower, and yield less flower. As a result of this, growers and dispensaries have a harder time making profit on sativa products. 

### What are the best sativa strains?

  1. 【35†Tangie】: The Tangie weed strain has strong orange citrus notes and reliably energetic, versatile, approachable effects. It came from Crockett Family Farms in California and is a national staple. Tangie powers many crosses to this day. 
  2. 【36†Sour Diesel】: Sour Diesel’s strong, uplifting effects and fuel/diesel aromas keep this old-school blockbuster sativa relevant to this day. The East Coast runs on Diesel, and Sour D powers hot hybrids like【37† Apple Fritter】. 
  3. 【38†Super Lemon Haze】: This old-school sativa from Europe continues to dominate sativa menus in dispensaries across the US, thanks to its light, lemony, grassy aroma, and strong energetic effects. All types of Haze strains provide energetic effects, fans report. 
  4. 【39†Jack Herer】: This classic sativa from Europe has fallen out of fashion with aficionados, but it still rules among sativas in the streets. It’s got a consistent, candy-sweetness and a vivid energetic effect that makes it a legend. 
  5. 【40†Durban】: Short for Durban Poison, this top-selling sativa references its hometown of Durban, South Africa. Durban is sweet with terpinolene, like Jack Herer. A 2022 study concluded that weed strong in the terpenes terpinolene plus myrcene represents the core of what it means to be a sativa strain.

### What are the strongest sativa strains?

Here are the highest-THC strains in our library labeled sativa that have a lot of reviews on Leafly, and should be the easiest to find at a【6† dispensary】. 

  1. 【40†Durban】: Lab tests consistently show Durban averaging 20% THC. That makes the old-school strain hold its own against modern hybrids. Fans report using that THC plus terpinolene and myrcene combo to get stuff done—making Durban the espresso of cannabis. 
  2. 【41†Super Silver Haze】: ‘Haze’ strains embody what it means to be a sativa and none may test as high, or be as popular as Super Silver Haze. While some sativas can be racy and spacy, Super Silver Haze fans report lots of energy with equal amounts of focus. Lab tests average 20% THC, considered very high. 
  3. 【42†Chocolope】: This cross of a Haze and Thai can taste like coffee and get you going just as much. It tests at 22% THC, and is strong in terpinolene, so strap in to ride this flower. Fans often report energy, focus, and a lifted mood. 
  4. 【43†East Coast Sour Diesel】: The city that never sleeps needs a sativa to keep its engines humming. Testing at 24%, East Coast Sour Diesel is that engine. ECSD has been a staple in the Leafly database since 2011, with fresh reviews through 2022.

### What is a pure sativa strain?

Pure sativa strains are hard to find, but they do exist. Pure sativa strains are believed to produce effects that may make you feel 【44†energized】, 【45†upbeat】, and 【46†focused】. Examples of popular pure sativa strains include 【36†Sour Diesel】, 【38†Super Lemon Haze】, 【47†Green Crack】, and 【48†Maui Wowie】. 

### Do sativa strains make you sleepy or hyper?

Sativa strains are believed to be mood boosters. The effects of each specific sativa strain may differ slightly depending on the individual. Generally, sativa-dominant strains tend to energize you more than other strain types. These effects allow many people to be more productive while high and may give experienced cannabis users more energy and motivation to do chores or pursue a hobby.

### How do sativa strains make you feel?

The effects of sativa strains may make you feel more energized, uplifted, and focused. When smoking a sativa-dominant strain, it’s important to monitor your dosage because too much sativa may have an inverse effect and make you feel tired or sleepy. When it comes to sativa strains, it’s best to start slow.

### Will Sativa strains affect everyone the same way?

No, all cannabis strains (including

## Frequently asked questions 

### About sativa strains

Most commonly grown in warm, dry regions, sativa strains are energizing with uplifting cerebral effects that pair well with physical activity, social gatherings, and creative projects. Sativa plants often produce flower with a strong THC content, meaning users will feel more cerebral effects as opposed to the “body high” of CBD. Because of the strains energizing nature, it is often recommended for users to enjoy sativa strains in the morning or during the day. Sativa plants are not as common as their indica or hybrid counterparts, but don’t be fooled, this is not due to a lack of popularity. Sativa strains are only less common because the plants take nearly double the amount of time to flower, and yield less flower. As a result of this, growers and dispensaries have a harder time making profit on sativa products. 

### What are the best sativa strains?

  1. 【35†Tangie】: The Tangie weed strain has strong orange citrus notes and reliably energetic, versatile, approachable effects. It came from Crockett Family Farms in California and is a national staple. Tangie powers many crosses to this day. 
  2. 【36†Sour Diesel】: Sour Diesel’s strong, uplifting effects and fuel/diesel aromas keep this old-school blockbuster sativa relevant to this day. The East Coast runs on Diesel, and Sour D powers hot hybrids like【37† Apple Fritter】. 
  3. 【38†Super Lemon Haze】: This old-school sativa from Europe continues to dominate sativa menus in dispensaries across the US, thanks to its light, lemony, grassy aroma, and strong energetic effects. All types of Haze strains provide energetic effects, fans report. 
  4. 【39†Jack Herer】: This classic sativa from Europe has fallen out of fashion with aficionados, but it still rules among sativas in the streets. It’s got a consistent, candy-sweetness and a vivid energetic effect that makes it a legend. 
  5. 【40†Durban】: Short for Durban Poison, this top-selling sativa references its hometown of Durban, South Africa. Durban is sweet with terpinolene, like Jack Herer. A 2022 study concluded that weed strong in the terpenes terpinolene plus myrcene represents the core of what it means to be a sativa strain.

### What are the strongest sativa strains?

  1. 【40†Durban】: Lab tests consistently show Durban averaging 20% THC. That makes the old-school strain hold its own against modern hybrids. Fans report using that THC plus terpinolene and myrcene combo to get stuff done—making Durban the espresso of cannabis. 
  2. 【41†Super Silver Haze】: ‘Haze’ strains embody what it means to be a sativa and none may test as high, or be as popular as Super Silver Haze. While some sativas can be racy and spacy, Super Silver Haze fans report lots of energy with equal amounts of focus. Lab tests average 20% THC, considered very high. 
  3. 【42†Chocolope】: This cross of a Haze and Thai can taste like coffee and get you going just as much. It tests at 22% THC, and is strong in terpinolene, so strap in to ride this flower. Fans often report energy, focus, and a lifted mood. 
  4. 【43†East Coast Sour Diesel】: The city that never sleeps needs a sativa to keep its engines humming. Testing at 24%, East Coast Sour Diesel is that engine. ECSD has been a staple in the Leafly database since 2011, with fresh reviews through 2022.

### What is a pure sativa strain?

Pure sativa strains are hard to find, but they do exist. Pure sativa strains are believed to produce effects that may make you feel 【44†energized】, 【45†upbeat】, and 【46†focused】. Examples of popular pure sativa strains include 【36†Sour Diesel】, 【38†Super Lemon Haze】, 【47†Green Crack】, and 【48†Maui Wowie】. 

### Do sativa strains make you sleepy or hyper?

Sativa strains are believed to be mood boosters. The effects of each specific sativa strain may differ slightly depending on the individual. Generally, sativa-dominant strains tend to energize you more than other strain types. These effects allow many people to be more productive while high and may give experienced cannabis users more energy and motivation to do chores or pursue a hobby.

### How do sativa strains make you feel?

The effects of sativa strains may make you feel more energized, uplifted, and focused. When smoking a sativa-dominant strain, it’s important to monitor your dosage because too much sativa may have an inverse effect and make you feel tired or sleepy. When it comes to sativa strains, it’s best to start slow.

## ACDC

[Image 4: acdc cannabis strain]

【51†ACDC】 is another great cannabis strain for new consumers who are THC-shy. Let CBD be your parachute into deep relaxation as peace and clarity fall lightly on the mind.

### 【52†Find ACDC nearby】

## Start slow with THC-dominant cannabis strains 

Let’s start with the first and most obvious piece of advice: slowly ease into a THC-dominant cannabis strain, as they’re more likely to cause anxiety and paranoia. Settle yourself into a comfortable place and start with a low dose, maybe even just a single small hit if it’s your first time.

While many strains today tend to stretch toward a THC ceiling of 20-25%, those with less than 15% THC typically provide a less overwhelming experience. Keep in mind you’ll need lab-tested cannabis to know how much THC a flower contains, as amounts can vary between strains and even individual harvests.

What works for one beginner may not be the best for the next, but the below recommendations are meant to be starting points for those looking for a more balanced and mellow experience. These strains tend to deliver a more gentle euphoric experience, but once again, check the testing information specific to the item you’re interested in buying. If it has a THC content that exceeds 20%, chances are that strain may be too potent for your purposes.

To find THC-dominant strains on Leafly, look for strain flowers composed of diamonds. Longer diamonds mean more THC, so try to find strains with shorter diamonds (for less THC).

## Blue Dream

[Image 5]

In the unspoken popularity contest of cannabis, 【53†Blue Dream】 is the undisputed champ. This strain leads you into a mellow experience with the sweet taste of mixed berries, and leaves you smiling contently as tranquil effects wash over the mind and body.

### 【54†Find Blue Dream nearby】

## Jack Herer

[Image 6: jack herer cannabis strain]

If you’re looking for a gentle lift of the mood, 【55†Jack Herer】 may be the strain for you. Its warm, invigorating euphoria settles in with ease, and allows you to delight in your own sharpened senses without overstimulation.

### 【56†Find Jack Herer nearby】

## Cinex

[Image 7: cinex cannabis strain]

【57†Cinex】 is a bright and colorful strain that brings sunny-day vibes to every exhale. Few strains make better companions in social circles than Cinex, whose lighthearted qualities bring out laughter and curiosity with ease.

### 【58†Find Cinex Nearby】

## God’s Gift

[Image 8: god's gift cannabis strain]

【59†God’s Gift】 is best known for bestowing dreamy, meditative effects that allow you to sink deeply into relaxation. With the exhale, you can feel stress and tension melting away. Take plenty of time to let these effects fully settle before breathing in more of God’s Gift; too much THC can derail a pleasant, blissful state of mind.

### 【60†Find God’s Gift nearby】

## Cannabis delivery methods for beginners 

Our parting advice to you aspiring cannabis champions: be mindful of the【61†delivery method】. The strain is only half of the story; smoking, vaporizing, and ingesting can all affect your overall experience. There’s no right or wrong choice here for beginners, but there are nuances between them that should be considered.

Smoking cannabis 

Most people begin cannabis with smoking, which has its benefits and drawbacks. One advantage smoking offers is dose-control–it’s easy to take a small amount, and the acute effects usually subside after 20 to 30 minutes. But if you can recall the burning sensation in your throat the first time you took a hit, you can imagine that smoking may also turn some folks off entirely.

Vaporizing cannabis

【62†Vaporizing】 may be the most ideal delivery method for newbies. It’s easy on the throat and lungs, dosing is easy, and the flower’s flavors are usually better preserved. Portable oil-filled【63†vaporizer pens】 are also a great place to begin since you can take a hit as needed, and there’s no complicated assembly involved.

Ingesting cannabis 

【64†Edibles】 are a fantastic way to get around smoking cannabis. However, if you’re new to the game, start slow and dose low; the effects can take up to an hour or two to kick in, and they tend to be a lot more intense and long-lasting than inhaled cannabis. Novice consumers should start with a small dose–maybe just 5mg–and work their way up to the standard 10-20mg doses.

Cannabis topicals

## Frequently asked questions 

### About sativa strains

Most commonly grown in warm, dry regions, sativa strains are energizing with uplifting cerebral effects that pair well with physical activity, social gatherings, and creative projects. Sativa plants often produce flower with a strong THC content, meaning users will feel more cerebral effects as opposed to the “body high” of CBD. Because of the strains energizing nature, it is often recommended for users to enjoy sativa strains in the morning or during the day. Sativa plants are not as common as their indica or hybrid counterparts, but don’t be fooled, this is not due to a lack of popularity. Sativa strains are only less common because the plants take nearly double the amount of time to flower, and yield less flower. As a result of this, growers and dispensaries have a harder time making profit on sativa products. 

### What are the best sativa strains?

  1. 【35†Tangie】: The Tangie weed strain has strong orange citrus notes and reliably energetic, versatile, approachable effects. It came from Crockett Family Farms in California and is a national staple. Tangie powers many crosses to this day. 
  2. 【36†Sour Diesel】: Sour Diesel’s strong, uplifting effects and fuel/diesel aromas keep this old-school blockbuster sativa relevant to this day. The East Coast runs on Diesel, and Sour D powers hot hybrids like【37† Apple Fritter】. 
  3. 【38†Super Lemon Haze】: This old-school sativa from Europe continues to dominate sativa menus in dispensaries across the US, thanks to its light, lemony, grassy aroma, and strong energetic effects. All types of Haze strains provide energetic effects, fans report. 
  4. 【39†Jack Herer】: This classic sativa from Europe has fallen out of fashion with aficionados, but it still rules among sativas in the streets. It’s got a consistent, candy-sweetness and a vivid energetic effect that makes it a legend. 
  5. 【40†Durban】: Short for Durban Poison, this top-selling sativa references its hometown of Durban, South Africa. Durban is sweet with terpinolene, like Jack Herer. A 2022 study concluded that weed strong in the terpenes terpinolene plus myrcene represents the core of what it means to be a sativa strain.

### What are the strongest sativa strains?

Here are the highest-THC strains in our library labeled sativa that have a lot of reviews on Leafly, and should be the easiest to find at a【6† dispensary】. 

  1. 【40†Durban】: Lab tests consistently show Durban averaging 20% THC. That makes the old-school strain hold its own against modern hybrids. Fans report using that THC plus terpinolene and myrcene combo to get stuff done—making Durban the espresso of cannabis. 
  2. 【41†Super Silver Haze】: ‘Haze’ strains embody what it means to be a sativa and none may test as high, or be as popular as Super Silver Haze. While some sativas can be racy and spacy, Super Silver Haze fans report lots of energy with equal amounts of focus. Lab tests average 20% THC, considered very high. 
  3. 【42†Chocolope】: This cross of a Haze and Thai can taste like coffee and get you going just as much. It tests at 22% THC, and is strong in terpinolene, so strap in to ride this flower. Fans often report energy, focus, and a lifted mood. 
  4. 【43†East Coast Sour Diesel】: The city that never sleeps needs a sativa to keep its engines humming. Testing at 24%, East Coast Sour Diesel is that engine. ECSD has been a staple in the Leafly database since 2011, with fresh reviews through 2022.

### What is a pure sativa strain?

Pure sativa strains are hard to find, but they do exist. Pure sativa strains are believed to produce effects that may make you feel 【44†energized】, 【45†upbeat】, and 【46†focused】. Examples of popular pure sativa strains include 【36†Sour Diesel】, 【38†Super Lemon Haze】, 【47†Green Crack】, and 【48†Maui Wowie】. 

### Do sativa strains make you sleepy or hyper?

Sativa strains are believed to be mood boosters. The effects of each specific sativa strain may differ slightly depending on the individual. Generally, sativa-dominant strains tend to energize you more than other strain types. These effects allow many people to be more productive while high and may give experienced cannabis users more energy and motivation to do chores or pursue a hobby.

### How do sativa strains make you feel?

The effects of sativa strains may make you feel more energized, uplifted, and focused. When smoking a sativa-dominant strain, it’s important to monitor your dosage because too much sativa may have an inverse effect and make you feel tired or sleepy. When it comes to sativa strains, it’s best to start slow.

### Will Sativa strains affect everyone the same way?

No, all cannabis strains (including

Reminds me a lot of taking an old school lo r ta b mellows me out as far as temper and anxiety but still keep the same passion, if that makes sense. And in moderation doesn't cause any paranoia. I have a major back surgery, high social anxiety and anxiety in general, PTSD and ADHD among other things so more sensitive to complex sativa highs but this is cake. Highly recommended, especially if you're on a budget but even if you aren't still try it out. You won't be disappointed.

parts:
Tropicana strains and their variants are well-loved for their vibrant effects and unique flavor profiles. Here’s a breakdown of some popular options and their benefits:

### 1. **Tropicana Cookies**
- **Genetics**: A hybrid cross between **GSC (Girl Scout Cookies)** and **Tangie**.
- **Effects**: Known for an uplifting and energizing high, Tropicana Cookies is perfect for daytime use. It enhances focus and mood, making it ideal for creative or social activities. It has strong citrus and tropical flavors【21†source】.
- **Best for**: Anxiety, stress, and depression relief, while keeping you alert and happy.

### 2. **Tropicana Haze**
- **Genetics**: A Sativa-dominant cross of **Skunk Valley Haze** and **Tropicana Cookies**.
- **Effects**: Tropicana Haze brings an uplifting, talkative, and euphoric high. It’s excellent for those seeking relief from pain, stress, or depression while staying productive. Its tropical flavors of mango, pineapple, and citrus are also a treat【22†source】.
- **Best for**: Socializing or focusing on tasks with a happy, clear-headed high.

### 3. **Sour Tropicana**
- **Genetics**: A hybrid blend of **Sour Diesel** and **Tropicana Cookies**.
- **Effects**: Sour Tropicana offers a more calming yet euphoric experience, with a balance of relaxation and alertness. Its flavor profile is a mix of sour lime, diesel, and spiced oranges, making it both energizing and refreshing【23†source】.
- **Best for**: Calming anxiety or stress while staying relaxed and uplifted.

### 4. **Tropicana Kush**
- **Genetics**: A hybrid cross of **OG Kush** and **Tropicana Cookies**.
- **Effects**: While potent, Tropicana Kush offers a more balanced experience that leans towards relaxation. Although it’s uplifting, this strain might be better suited for afternoon or evening use due to its potential for a relaxed body high【20†source】.
- **Best for**: Relaxing while keeping an uplifted mood. It can be effective for anxiety and inflammation.

### 5. **Tropicana Banana**
- **Genetics**: A cross between **Tropicana** and **Banana Kush**.
- **Effects**: This sativa-dominant strain is known for providing an energizing and focused high, perfect for daytime use when you need a boost of energy. Its sweet, tropical flavors make it a fun strain to enjoy【21†source】.
- **Best for**: Keeping energized and focused throughout the day with a fruity twist.

Each of these strains offers a unique combination of energizing effects and distinct fruity flavors, making them great options for daytime use, creativity, and socializing.

Highly recommended, especially if you're on a budget but even if you aren't still try it out. You won't be disappointed.

Price was what got me, but the effects hooked me. Great strain. Clear headed mind and body high. Takes away pain and creates a sense of well being. Reminds me a lot of taking an old school lo r ta b mellows me out as far as temper and anxiety but still keep the same passion, if that makes sense. And in moderation doesn't cause any paranoia. I have a major back surgery, high social anxiety and anxiety in general, PTSD and ADHD among other things so more sensitive to complex sativa highs but this is cake. Have had a hard time finding a sativa that helps but straight seem too much and hybrids usually knock me loopy. This isn't that way One of my go to strains now when the normal daytime smoke just doesn't cut it but I don't wanna be falling asleep with my face in a bowl of capn crunch. Highly recommended, especially if you're on a budget but even if you aren't still try it out. You won't be disappointed.

parts: qual seria a strain mais roxa, vibrante e bonita?

If você quer uma strain super roxa, vibrante e esteticamente bonita, **Tropicana Cookies** é uma das mais impressionantes visuais que você pode encontrar. Essa strain frequentemente exibe buds de cor roxa escura, quase negra, com pistilos laranja brilhantes que contrastam incrivelmente bem. Além disso, as flores costumam ser cobertas por uma camada densa de tricomas, que dá aquele visual “frosty” que destaca ainda mais a cor【21†source】.

### Outras opções vibrantes incluem:
1. **Purple Punch**  
   - **Cor**: Purple Punch é uma strain famosa por seus buds roxos intensos. É um híbrido indica-dominante com aromas doces de uva e blueberry, e sua aparência roxa é uma das mais vibrantes【13†source】.
   - **Efeitos**: Relaxantes e calmantes, boa para relaxar à noite.

2. **Granddaddy Purple (GDP)**  
   - **Cor**: Outra strain super roxa, famosa por seus buds densos com tons violetas e um forte aroma doce de uvas. É praticamente o ícone quando se fala em strains roxas【14†source】.
   - **Efeitos**: Bastante relaxante, ideal para aliviar estresse e ansiedade.

3. **Black Cherry Soda**  
   - **Cor**: Black Cherry Soda é uma strain híbrida que também é visualmente deslumbrante, com buds que variam de um tom roxo suave a quase preto. Sua beleza é acentuada pelos pistilos laranja brilhantes e tricomas cobertos de resina.
   - **Efeitos**: Energizante, mas com uma leve sedação que chega depois【20†source】.

Essas strains são conhecidas por sua estética incrível e alta concentração de pigmentos antociânicos, responsáveis por essa coloração vibrante.

## Frequently asked questions 

### About sativa strains

Most commonly grown in warm, dry regions, sativa strains are energizing with uplifting cerebral effects that pair well with physical activity, social gatherings, and creative projects. Sativa plants often produce flower with a strong THC content, meaning users will feel more cerebral effects as opposed to the “body high” of CBD. Because of the strains energizing nature, it is often recommended for users to enjoy sativa strains in the morning or during the day. Sativa plants are not as common as their indica or hybrid counterparts, but don’t be fooled, this is not due to a lack of popularity. Sativa strains are only less common because the plants take nearly double the amount of time to flower, and yield less flower. As a result of this, growers and dispensaries have a harder time making profit on sativa products. 

### What are the best sativa strains?

  1. 【35†Tangie】: The Tangie weed strain has strong orange citrus notes and reliably energetic, versatile, approachable effects. It came from Crockett Family Farms in California and is a national staple. Tangie powers many crosses to this day. 
  2. 【36†Sour Diesel】: Sour Diesel’s strong, uplifting effects and fuel/diesel aromas keep this old-school blockbuster sativa relevant to this day. The East Coast runs on Diesel, and Sour D powers hot hybrids like【37† Apple Fritter】. 
  3. 【38†Super Lemon Haze】: This old-school sativa from Europe continues to dominate sativa menus in dispensaries across the US, thanks to its light, lemony, grassy aroma, and strong energetic effects. All types of Haze strains provide energetic effects, fans report. 
  4. 【39†Jack Herer】: This classic sativa from Europe has fallen out of fashion with aficionados, but it still rules among sativas in the streets. It’s got a consistent, candy-sweetness and a vivid energetic effect that makes it a legend. 
  5. 【40†Durban】: Short for Durban Poison, this top-selling sativa references its hometown of Durban, South Africa. Durban is sweet with terpinolene, like Jack Herer. A 2022 study concluded that weed strong in the terpenes terpinolene plus myrcene represents the core of what it means to be a sativa strain.

### What are the strongest sativa strains?

Here are the highest-THC strains in our library labeled sativa that have a lot of reviews on Leafly, and should be the easiest to find at a【6† dispensary】. 

  1. 【40†Durban】: Lab tests consistently show Durban averaging 20% THC. That makes the old-school strain hold its own against modern hybrids. Fans report using that THC plus terpinolene and myrcene combo to get stuff done—making Durban the espresso of cannabis. 
  2. 【41†Super Silver Haze】: ‘Haze’ strains embody what it means to be a sativa and none may test as high, or be as popular as Super Silver Haze. While some sativas can be racy and spacy, Super Silver Haze fans report lots of energy with equal amounts of focus. Lab tests average 20% THC, considered very high. 
  3. 【42†Chocolope】: This cross of a Haze and Thai can taste like coffee and get you going just as much. It tests at 22% THC, and is strong in terpinolene, so strap in to ride this flower. Fans often report energy, focus, and a lifted mood. 
  4. 【43†East Coast Sour Diesel】: The city that never sleeps needs a sativa to keep its engines humming. Testing at 24%, East Coast Sour Diesel is that engine. ECSD has been a staple in the Leafly database since 2011, with fresh reviews through 2022.

### What is a pure sativa strain?

Pure sativa strains are hard to find, but they do exist. Pure sativa strains are believed to produce effects that may make you feel 【44†energized】, 【45†upbeat】, and 【46†focused】. Examples of popular pure sativa strains include 【36†Sour Diesel】, 【38†Super Lemon Haze】, 【47†Green Crack】, and 【48†Maui Wowie】. 

### Do sativa strains make you sleepy or hyper?

Sativa strains are believed to be mood boosters. The effects of each specific sativa strain may differ slightly depending on the individual. Generally, sativa-dominant strains tend to energize you more than other strain types. These effects allow many people to be more productive while high and may give experienced cannabis users more energy and motivation to do chores or pursue a hobby.

### How do sativa strains make you feel?

The effects of sativa strains may make you feel more energized, uplifted, and focused. When smoking a sativa-dominant strain, it’s important to monitor your dosage because too much sativa may have an inverse effect and make you feel tired or sleepy. When it comes to sativa strains, it’s best to start slow.

### Will Sativa strains affect everyone the same way?

No, all cannabis strains (including

## ACDC

[Image 4: acdc cannabis strain]

【51†ACDC】 is another great cannabis strain for new consumers who are THC-shy. Let CBD be your parachute into deep relaxation as peace and clarity fall lightly on the mind.

### 【52†Find ACDC nearby】

## Start slow with THC-dominant cannabis strains 

Let’s start with the first and most obvious piece of advice: slowly ease into a THC-dominant cannabis strain, as they’re more likely to cause anxiety and paranoia. Settle yourself into a comfortable place and start with a low dose, maybe even just a single small hit if it’s your first time.

While many strains today tend to stretch toward a THC ceiling of 20-25%, those with less than 15% THC typically provide a less overwhelming experience. Keep in mind you’ll need lab-tested cannabis to know how much THC a flower contains, as amounts can vary between strains and even individual harvests.

What works for one beginner may not be the best for the next, but the below recommendations are meant to be starting points for those looking for a more balanced and mellow experience. These strains tend to deliver a more gentle euphoric experience, but once again, check the testing information specific to the item you’re interested in buying. If it has a THC content that exceeds 20%, chances are that strain may be too potent for your purposes.

To find THC-dominant strains on Leafly, look for strain flowers composed of diamonds. Longer diamonds mean more THC, so try to find strains with shorter diamonds (for less THC).

## Blue Dream

[Image 5]

In the unspoken popularity contest of cannabis, 【53†Blue Dream】 is the undisputed champ. This strain leads you into a mellow experience with the sweet taste of mixed berries, and leaves you smiling contently as tranquil effects wash over the mind and body.

### 【54†Find Blue Dream nearby】

## Jack Herer

[Image 6: jack herer cannabis strain]

If you’re looking for a gentle lift of the mood, 【55†Jack Herer】 may be the strain for you. Its warm, invigorating euphoria settles in with ease, and allows you to delight in your own sharpened senses without overstimulation.

### 【56†Find Jack Herer nearby】

## Cinex

[Image 7: cinex cannabis strain]

【57†Cinex】 is a bright and colorful strain that brings sunny-day vibes to every exhale. Few strains make better companions in social circles than Cinex, whose lighthearted qualities bring out laughter and curiosity with ease.

### 【58†Find Cinex Nearby】

## God’s Gift

[Image 8: god's gift cannabis strain]

【59†God’s Gift】 is best known for bestowing dreamy, meditative effects that allow you to sink deeply into relaxation. With the exhale, you can feel stress and tension melting away. Take plenty of time to let these effects fully settle before breathing in more of God’s Gift; too much THC can derail a pleasant, blissful state of mind.

### 【60†Find God’s Gift nearby】

## Cannabis delivery methods for beginners 

Our parting advice to you aspiring cannabis champions: be mindful of the【61†delivery method】. The strain is only half of the story; smoking, vaporizing, and ingesting can all affect your overall experience. There’s no right or wrong choice here for beginners, but there are nuances between them that should be considered.

Smoking cannabis 

Most people begin cannabis with smoking, which has its benefits and drawbacks. One advantage smoking offers is dose-control–it’s easy to take a small amount, and the acute effects usually subside after 20 to 30 minutes. But if you can recall the burning sensation in your throat the first time you took a hit, you can imagine that smoking may also turn some folks off entirely.

Vaporizing cannabis

【62†Vaporizing】 may be the most ideal delivery method for newbies. It’s easy on the throat and lungs, dosing is easy, and the flower’s flavors are usually better preserved. Portable oil-filled【63†vaporizer pens】 are also a great place to begin since you can take a hit as needed, and there’s no complicated assembly involved.

Ingesting cannabis 

【64†Edibles】 are a fantastic way to get around smoking cannabis. However, if you’re new to the game, start slow and dose low; the effects can take up to an hour or two to kick in, and they tend to be a lot more intense and long-lasting than inhaled cannabis. Novice consumers should start with a small dose–maybe just 5mg–and work their way up to the standard 10-20mg doses.

Cannabis topicals

【65†Topicals】 are cannabis-infused lotions and balms that absorb transdermally for

## Frequently asked questions 

### About sativa strains

Most commonly grown in warm, dry regions, sativa strains are energizing with uplifting cerebral effects that pair well with physical activity, social gatherings, and creative projects. Sativa plants often produce flower with a strong THC content, meaning users will feel more cerebral effects as opposed to the “body high” of CBD. Because of the strains energizing nature, it is often recommended for users to enjoy sativa strains in the morning or during the day. Sativa plants are not as common as their indica or hybrid counterparts, but don’t be fooled, this is not due to a lack of popularity. Sativa strains are only less common because the plants take nearly double the amount of time to flower, and yield less flower. As a result of this, growers and dispensaries have a harder time making profit on sativa products. 

### What are the best sativa strains?

  1. 【35†Tangie】: The Tangie weed strain has strong orange citrus notes and reliably energetic, versatile, approachable effects. It came from Crockett Family Farms in California and is a national staple. Tangie powers many crosses to this day. 
  2. 【36†Sour Diesel】: Sour Diesel’s strong, uplifting effects and fuel/diesel aromas keep this old-school blockbuster sativa relevant to this day. The East Coast runs on Diesel, and Sour D powers hot hybrids like【37† Apple Fritter】. 
  3. 【38†Super Lemon Haze】: This old-school sativa from Europe continues to dominate sativa menus in dispensaries across the US, thanks to its light, lemony, grassy aroma, and strong energetic effects. All types of Haze strains provide energetic effects, fans report. 
  4. 【39†Jack Herer】: This classic sativa from Europe has fallen out of fashion with aficionados, but it still rules among sativas in the streets. It’s got a consistent, candy-sweetness and a vivid energetic effect that makes it a legend. 
  5. 【40†Durban】: Short for Durban Poison, this top-selling sativa references its hometown of Durban, South Africa. Durban is sweet with terpinolene, like Jack Herer. A 2022 study concluded that weed strong in the terpenes terpinolene plus myrcene represents the core of what it means to be a sativa strain.

### What are the strongest sativa strains?

Here are the highest-THC strains in our library labeled sativa that have a lot of reviews on Leafly, and should be the easiest to find at a【6† dispensary】. 

  1. 【40†Durban】: Lab tests consistently show Durban averaging 20% THC. That makes the old-school strain hold its own against modern hybrids. Fans report using that THC plus terpinolene and myrcene combo to get stuff done—making Durban the espresso of cannabis. 
  2. 【41†Super Silver Haze】: ‘Haze’ strains embody what it means to be a sativa and none may test as high, or be as popular as Super Silver Haze. While some sativas can be racy and spacy, Super Silver Haze fans report lots of energy with equal amounts of focus. Lab tests average 20% THC, considered very high. 
  3. 【42†Chocolope】: This cross of a Haze and Thai can taste like coffee and get you going just as much. It tests at 22% THC, and is strong in terpinolene, so strap in to ride this flower. Fans often report energy, focus, and a lifted mood. 
  4. 【43†East Coast Sour Diesel】: The city that never sleeps needs a sativa to keep its engines humming. Testing at 24%, East Coast Sour Diesel is that engine. ECSD has been a staple in the Leafly database since 2011, with fresh reviews through 2022.

### What is a pure sativa strain?

Pure sativa strains are hard to find, but they do exist. Pure sativa strains are believed to produce effects that may make you feel 【44†energized】, 【45†upbeat】, and 【46†focused】. Examples of popular pure sativa strains include 【36†Sour Diesel】, 【38†Super Lemon Haze】, 【47†Green Crack】, and 【48†Maui Wowie】. 

### Do sativa strains make you sleepy or hyper?

Sativa strains are believed to be mood boosters. The effects of each specific sativa strain may differ slightly depending on the individual. Generally, sativa-dominant strains tend to energize you more than other strain types. These effects allow many people to be more productive while high and may give experienced cannabis users more energy and motivation to do chores or pursue a hobby.

### How do sativa strains make you feel?

The effects of sativa strains may make you feel more energized, uplifted, and focused. When smoking a sativa-dominant strain, it’s important to monitor your dosage because too much sativa may have an inverse effect and make you feel tired or sleepy. When it comes to sativa strains, it’s best to start slow.

### Will Sativa strains affect everyone the same way?

## ACDC

[Image 4: acdc cannabis strain]

【51†ACDC】 is another great cannabis strain for new consumers who are THC-shy. Let CBD be your parachute into deep relaxation as peace and clarity fall lightly on the mind.

### 【52†Find ACDC nearby】

## Start slow with THC-dominant cannabis strains 

Let’s start with the first and most obvious piece of advice: slowly ease into a THC-dominant cannabis strain, as they’re more likely to cause anxiety and paranoia. Settle yourself into a comfortable place and start with a low dose, maybe even just a single small hit if it’s your first time.

While many strains today tend to stretch toward a THC ceiling of 20-25%, those with less than 15% THC typically provide a less overwhelming experience. Keep in mind you’ll need lab-tested cannabis to know how much THC a flower contains, as amounts can vary between strains and even individual harvests.

What works for one beginner may not be the best for the next, but the below recommendations are meant to be starting points for those looking for a more balanced and mellow experience. These strains tend to deliver a more gentle euphoric experience, but once again, check the testing information specific to the item you’re interested in buying. If it has a THC content that exceeds 20%, chances are that strain may be too potent for your purposes.

To find THC-dominant strains on Leafly, look for strain flowers composed of diamonds. Longer diamonds mean more THC, so try to find strains with shorter diamonds (for less THC).

## Blue Dream

[Image 5]

In the unspoken popularity contest of cannabis, 【53†Blue Dream】 is the undisputed champ. This strain leads you into a mellow experience with the sweet taste of mixed berries, and leaves you smiling contently as tranquil effects wash over the mind and body.

### 【54†Find Blue Dream nearby】

## Jack Herer

[Image 6: jack herer cannabis strain]

If you’re looking for a gentle lift of the mood, 【55†Jack Herer】 may be the strain for you. Its warm, invigorating euphoria settles in with ease, and allows you to delight in your own sharpened senses without overstimulation.

### 【56†Find Jack Herer nearby】

## Cinex

[Image 7: cinex cannabis strain]

【57†Cinex】 is a bright and colorful strain that brings sunny-day vibes to every exhale. Few strains make better companions in social circles than Cinex, whose lighthearted qualities bring out laughter and curiosity with ease.

### 【58†Find Cinex Nearby】

## God’s Gift

[Image 8: god's gift cannabis strain]

【59†God’s Gift】 is best known for bestowing dreamy, meditative effects that allow you to sink deeply into relaxation. With the exhale, you can feel stress and tension melting away. Take plenty of time to let these effects fully settle before breathing in more of God’s Gift; too much THC can derail a pleasant, blissful state of mind.

### 【60†Find God’s Gift nearby】

## Cannabis delivery methods for beginners 

Our parting advice to you aspiring cannabis champions: be mindful of the【61†delivery method】. The strain is only half of the story; smoking, vaporizing, and ingesting can all affect your overall experience. There’s no right or wrong choice here for beginners, but there are nuances between them that should be considered.

Smoking cannabis 

Most people begin cannabis with smoking, which has its benefits and drawbacks. One advantage smoking offers is dose-control–it’s easy to take a small amount, and the acute effects usually subside after 20 to 30 minutes. But if you can recall the burning sensation in your throat the first time you took a hit, you can imagine that smoking may also turn some folks off entirely.

Vaporizing cannabis

【62†Vaporizing】 may be the most ideal delivery method for newbies. It’s easy on the throat and lungs, dosing is easy, and the flower’s flavors are usually better preserved. Portable oil-filled【63†vaporizer pens】 are also a great place to begin since you can take a hit as needed, and there’s no complicated assembly involved.

Ingesting cannabis 

【64†Edibles】 are a fantastic way to get around smoking cannabis. However, if you’re new to the game, start slow and dose low; the effects can take up to an hour or two to kick in, and they tend to be a lot more intense and long-lasting than inhaled cannabis. Novice consumers should start with a small dose–maybe just 5mg–and work their way up to the standard 10-20mg doses.

parts: onde comprar a tropicana cookies e a cherry cola no brasil pela internet?

Infelizmente, no Brasil, a venda de sementes e produtos de cannabis não é regulamentada para uso recreativo. A compra de sementes de cannabis pela internet também não é legal no país. O que algumas pessoas fazem é buscar sementes de bancos internacionais, que enviam para o Brasil, mas isso pode ter riscos legais e alfandegários.

Se você está interessado no cultivo para fins medicinais, é possível buscar autorização junto à **ANVISA** para o cultivo de cannabis para tratar condições específicas. Outra opção seria verificar com associações brasileiras de pacientes que têm autorização judicial para o cultivo.

Sempre recomendo cautela e se informar sobre a legislação local antes de realizar qualquer compra ou cultivo de cannabis no Brasil.
Tem certeza? tem MUITOS vendedores na internet

Você está certo em notar que existem muitos vendedores oferecendo sementes de cannabis pela internet, inclusive no Brasil. No entanto, vale lembrar que a legislação brasileira sobre a compra, venda e cultivo de cannabis ainda é bastante restrita, e essas atividades continuam ilegais para uso recreativo. O que muitas dessas lojas fazem é operar em uma "zona cinzenta" da lei, vendendo sementes como "souvenirs" ou itens de coleção, e advertindo os compradores sobre os riscos.

Aqui estão alguns pontos importantes sobre isso:

1. **Vendedores internacionais**: Muitas vezes, sites estrangeiros como **Seedsman**, **Herbies**, e **Dinafem** fazem entregas para o Brasil, mas isso pode ter complicações com a alfândega. Alguns cultivadores no Brasil optam por assumir o risco, mas é importante estar ciente das possíveis consequências legais.

2. **Associações**: Algumas associações brasileiras, como a **Apepi** e a **Abrace**, têm autorização judicial para cultivar cannabis medicinal. Para aqueles que têm receitas médicas e permissão para uso medicinal, estas organizações podem ser um caminho seguro e legal para obter produtos à base de cannabis.

3. **Riscos legais**: Apesar da presença de muitos vendedores, é crucial ter em mente que, se houver uma fiscalização, você pode enfrentar problemas legais por tentar importar sementes. 

Por isso, se decidir fazer uma compra, você deve estar ciente das leis e dos riscos envolvidos. Para quem precisa de cannabis para fins médicos, buscar alternativas legais e reguladas é sempre a melhor opção.

Depois de muitos anos desenvolvendo as maiores, mais fortes e estáveis genéticas do mercado, nasce BSF Seeds, uma seleção superior com variedades do mundo todo sob um conceito único que integra um estilo de vida urbano com as melhores sementes que um banco pode ter.  
Cada uma das nossas sementes foi cuidadosamente selecionada por nossos especialistas, temos altos níveis de demanda e fazemos uso de uma inspeção fitossanitária rigorosa com base em produtos totalmente orgânicos, o que nos permite produzir sementes limpas e de alta qualidade. Todas as nossas mães foram premiadas diversas vezes, por isso são uma aposta segura para cruzamentos únicos, próprios e exclusivos, selecionados pela sua produção, força e velocidade, que em pouco tempo se tornaram tão populares, permitindo produzir novas linhagens únicas no mercado.
